item.title: Dungeon Hunters Codes (December 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Roblox Dungeon Hunters monthly redeem codes for December 2025 to get your hands on plenty of free rewards, including Gems and much more. 

Unlocking new worlds and clearing every chapter in Dungeon Hunters takes a lot of grinding. As you progress, newly unlocked Worlds become tougher, forcing you to level up, deal more damage, equip better armor, and unlock stronger gear. To speed things up, you can redeem the active Dungeon Hunters codes to earn free Gems. Gems are instrumental since they’re used to summon weapon cases, giving you access to stronger weapons early on. With the right weapons from free Gems, you can clear even the toughest dungeons without spending hours in this thrilling Roblox experience.

Active Dungeon Hunters Codes

  • DC_1000 – 100 Gems (New)
  • DC_500 – 100 Gems
  • DC_100 – 100 Gems
  • 12K_LiKes – 100 Gems
  • 5K_lIKes – 100 Gems
  • 1K_LiKes – 100 Gems
  • 100liKES – 100 Gems
  • 100liKES – 100 Gems
  • DC_join – 100 Gems
  • NEW – 100 Gems

Inactive Dungeon Hunters Codes

There are no inactive codes for Dungeon Hunters. Whenever an active code expires, it’ll be added here. Double-check the codes before redeeming, as the promo codes are case-sensitive. 

How To Redeem Dungeon Hunters Codes

Follow these steps to activate all the codes in Dungeon Hunters: 

  1. Launch the game and connect to the lobby.
  2. Press the settings icon at the top right corner of the screen. 
  3. Enter any code into the “Enter code…” text box. 
  4. Click the “OK” button to redeem the code. 

More About Dungeon Hunters

You have a slight chance of summoning weapons with one of these three Elements: Fire Element, Poison Element, and Thunder Element. You can summon 1 case for 100 Gems, 10 for 1000 Gems. Fill the Epic Pity, Legendary Pity, and Mythical Pity bars by constantly summoning weapons. This will increase your chances of getting the rarest weapons. Here are all the weapons with their summon chance percentages: 

Weapon Case Summon #1:

  • Death Scythe – 0.4%
  • Guitar – 1.4%
  • Mantis Blades – 11.2%
  • Duel Berettas – 37%
  • Hammer – 50% 

Weapon Case Summon #2:

  • Floating Cannon – 0.4% 
  • Electric Saw – 1.4%
  • Magic Book – 11.2%
  • Shield – 37%
  • Katana – 50%

Weapon Case Summon #3:

  • Scarlet Edge – 0.4%
  • Golden Guard – 1.4%
  • Violet Duals – 11.2%
  • Bass – 37%
  • Saw – 50%

FAQs on Dungeon Hunters

What are the latest active codes in Dungeon Hunters? 

“DC_1000” is the latest active code. 

What code offers the most Gems upon redemption? 

Currently, all the active codes can be redeemed for 100 Gems each in Dungeon Hunters. 

Can you claim Traits and weapons from the active codes?

Currently, none of the active codes offer free Traits and weapons.

Having fun using codes in Roblox games? Then check out the latest codes for 99 Nights in the Forest, Type Soul, and Azure Latch. Also, check out the Insider Gaming Discord server.

item.title: IShowSpeed Coming to Fortnite as Latest Icon Series
item.content:encoded:
Epic Games may have wrapped up for Christmas, but there is still one more treat in store for players with the release of an IShowSpeed Icon Series skin tomorrow, leaks state.

Fortnite’s huge string of collabs has continued for the festive season, with the likes of Hatsune Miku, Sabrina Carpenter, Harry Potter, and SpongeBob SquarePants joining the game, and there’s set to be another Icon Series skin on Christmas Eve.

IShowSpeed Coming to Fortnite

Reports of a new Icon Series coming to Fortnite first came from SpushFNBR, who speculated that it would be IShowSpeed receiving the special treatment, and other established leaks, including FireMonkey, stated that it would indeed be the popular streamer who joins the Icon Series gang.

Rumors of an IShowSpeed skin in Fortnite started to emerge after the streamer responded to a question asking what his stream scheduled for December 24th would be about, which he stated would see him “go back to my first stream ever.”

IShowSpeed’s first stream was playing Fortnite, and his comments now align with the leaks of a new treat that will be added to the Item Shop just in time for Christmas.

However, while the collab will include the usual Outfits, Back Blings, Pickaxes, Gliders, and even a Jam Track, there won’t be any emotes in the bundle, a decision that will raise eyebrows considering the huge amount of popular memes IShowSpeed has become famous for, including his barking, backflip, and imitation of Cristiano Ronaldo’s Siu celebration.

Official confirmation of the Icon Series addition and pricing of the individual items and the bundle have yet to be revealed, with it likely that it will be Speed himself that unveils the skin, following the trend showcased with previous reveals in the past.

What Icon Series skins should Fortnite bring out in 2026? Share your thoughts in the Insider Gaming Discord.

For more Fortnite, find out how to collect Shiny Llamas for free rewards, and check out where to find the DeLorean in Fortnite.
